app.containers.HomePage.title: Peeranha - Decentralized Q&A website with crypto rewards
app.containers.HomePage.description: Decentralized questions and answers website that rewards users with crypto tokens for their contributions.
app.containers.HomePage.weAreDecentraliz: Decentralized questions and answers website that rewards users with crypto tokens for their contributions.
app.containers.HomePage.differentThan: Peeranha is more than a Q&A website.
app.containers.HomePage.differentThan2: It is a community that puts users at the heart by:
app.containers.HomePage.peopleSaveHours: Millions of people save hours of work through the knowledge of others on Q&A websites on a daily basis. Peeranha’s users are rewarded with PEER crypto tokens for valuable activities.
app.containers.HomePage.peeranhaDecentra: Peeranha is truly permissionless and decentralized. Website governance is decided for the community, by the community. Peeranha puts power in the hands of the contributors, not the developers.
app.containers.HomePage.peeranhaPhilosop: Peeranha’s philosophy is to reward early users generously for their time. As the website grows, rewards will even out and be distributed to more members of the community.
app.containers.HomePage.askQuestionAndGe: Peeranha has passionate experts from all areas of life ready to help others. Users can return the favor by helping thousands of others answer questions they may also have. Users can get the answers to their questions in a matter of minutes.
app.containers.HomePage.helpCommunity: Experts contribute to the community by answering questions from their peers. Answers not only help the person who asked the question but thousands of others who have similar questions. Once a question has been answered, the knowledge can be shared with current and future users.
app.containers.HomePage.getPaidInCryptoF: A weekly pool of reward tokens is distributed to users for their contributions. Contributions include asking and answering questions. These reward tokens can be sold on the open market to anyone wanting to pay for content to be placed on the platform. This paid content may include product advertisements or job openings. Users will always be rewarded for their valuable contributions.
app.containers.HomePage.whetherYouAsk: As users build their level of contributions, they also improve their reputation. The community recognizes valuable contributors who answer questions for others. Earning a high reputation unlocks privileges as a user’s standing within the community increases!
app.containers.HomePage.participateInMod: Governing the community is in the hands of the members. Making the best decisions for the platform result in a higher token value. Through the governance structure built into Peeranha, the website is moderated by its users. As a decentralized, open source project, the future is decided by you the user. Much like a local community, your voice matters.
app.containers.HomePage.beTheFirst: Joining early means enjoying higher levels of rewards
app.containers.HomePage.rewardsPool: Rewards are distributed weekly to all contributors.  As the number of weekly contributors goes up, rewards per user go down over time. Joining early means enjoying higher levels of rewards for your pioneering contributions to an early community.
app.containers.HomePage.weAppreciate: We highly appreciate your feedback, opinion or suggestion for the platform. Send us few lines or even better let us know if you have 15 minutes to chat.
app.containers.HomePage.sergeyIlinDescri: Developer and architect with over decade of experience building software from websites to large scale enterprise solutions for Fortune 500 companies. Passionate about finding groundbreaking practical applications of Blockchain technology.
app.containers.HomePage.nikitaSyrDescrip: Blockchain app technician, interesting in solving different problems and learning new technologies. I believe that any problem can be solved with the right approach.
app.containers.HomePage.romRemDescriptio: Based in Minsk front-end developer, currently focused on data-management and User Experience in decentralized applications.
app.containers.HomePage.ulyanaPopovaDesc: Ready to produce wire-frames, mock-ups, and prototypes which implement the modernization of systems with an effective, efficient, aesthetic, and uncluttered user experience. Able to use humour and energy to keep the momentum going.
app.containers.HomePage.olgaFyodorovaDes: Strong communication skills regardless of the audience, interacting effectively with a wide range of people, executives, staff, suppliers, colleagues and applicants.
app.containers.HomePage.steveKreyninDesc: Successful serial entrepreneur. CEO of Forte Group, an international IT Consulting Company.
app.containers.HomePage.subject: Subject
app.containers.HomePage.platformUnderDev: The website is currently under development. Sign up for notifications to be one of the first to join and earn higher rewards as an early adopter.
app.containers.HomePage.messageHasNotBee: Something went wrong and your message has not been sent. Please try again.
app.containers.HomePage.yourEmailIsRegis: The website is under development but your email is registered. You will receive an email with the steps to continue registration when the website is ready.

app.containers.Login.weAreHappyYouAreHer: We are happy you are here
app.containers.Login.yourUsernameIsHow: Your username is how you'll be known on Peeranha.
app.containers.ForgotPassword.youGotThis: You got this key with authorization and saved in a safe place. Try to find it.
app.containers.SignUp.checkYourEmail: Check your email. You get verification code.
app.containers.SignUp.firstParagraphAlmo: Peeranha is not a typical Q&A platform. It's powered by Telos blockchain.
app.containers.SignUp.secondParagraphAlm: Telos blockchain powers many decentralized applications like Peeranha, and is run by community members all around the world. Telos blockchain account is required to use these applications. Fee is required to create Telos account.
app.containers.SignUp.thirdParagraphAlmo: We're happy to cover this fee for you but we'll need your email and phone number to manually check that you're a real person. This process could take 1-2 weeks.
app.containers.SignUp.weWillNotify: We will notify you when your account will be ready. Usually it takes no longer, than 4 hours.
app.containers.SignUp.theWayEosWorks: If you do not have Telos account then we will create it for you and cover the fee for account creation. You can still sign up using email address if already have Telos account and would like the convenience of login into application using email and password from any device.
app.containers.SignUp.ifYouCreateEos: Sounds too complicated? Do not worry! Just remember to write down you master key and save it in a safe place. Master Key is the only way to restore access to your account if you forget your password.
app.containers.SignUp.peeranhaIsNotTypic: Peeranha is not a typical Q&A platform. It's powered by Telos blockchain.
app.containers.SignUp.telosBlockchainPow: Telos blockchain powers many decentralized applications like Peeranha, and is run by community members all around the world. Telos blockchain account is required to use these applications.
app.containers.SignUp.weAreHappyToCover: Choose email sign up option if would like to access Peeranha using email and password from any device. We will also create Telos account for you if needed and cover the fee required for account creation. If you prefer to use a wallet application to manage the account, then Scatter sign up option is available.
app.containers.SignUp.ifYouLikeToSkip: New to blockchain? Do not worry! You will be able to access Peeranha using your email address and password as any other website.
app.containers.SignUp.doYouHaveAlreadyAc: Do you already have an account?
app.containers.SignUp.youHaveToSaveKeys: Master Key is the only way to restore access to your account if you forget your password! Write your Master Key on a piece of paper and store it in a secure location. Alternatively, store your Master Key in a password manager like 1Password.
app.containers.SignUp.title: Registration
app.containers.SignUp.iSaveMasterKey: I saved Master Key in a safe place. Understand that if I forget my password then Master Key is the only way to restore access to my account.
app.containers.SignUp.userAlreadyRegiste: User with such identity has been already registered
app.containers.SignUp.keysDoNotMatch: Private keys do not match Telos account name
app.containers.SignUp.registrationWithEo: Registration is successfully passed. Now you can login and continue work in our app!
